name: SkyNet (itch) (VP)
description:
Start of a game I'm making. Loosely based on the T2 Arcade retro-game.

Will be a static (parallax) shooter where the player must fight against increasing waves of Terminator Machines, Drone-ships and Tanks, though several scenarios, whilst protecting and rescuing innocent civilians.

Eventually the player must destroy the SkyNet system to free the World from the Tyranny of the Mechanised overlords.
